index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services; changing the name of the Division of Aging to the Divison on Aging and Disability Services; and amending the Seattle Municipal Code Sections 3.20.040, 3.20.080, 3.20.100 and 3.20.120.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
